channel.title: Synthetic Biology on cobrapy - constraint-based metabolic modeling in Python
channel.description: Recent content in Synthetic Biology on cobrapy - constraint-based metabolic modeling in Python

item.title: cameo
item.description: Cameo is a high-level python library developed to aid the strain design process in metabolic engineering projects. The library provides a modular framework of simulation methods, strain design methods, access to models, that targets developers that want custom analysis workflows. Computationally heavy methods have been parallelized and can be run on a clusters using the IPython parallelization framework (see example and documentation for more details). The default fallback is python’s multiprocessing library.
